name: Don Duality
storyline:
You take on the role of a restaurant owner who just happens to be the Don of a mafia group.
You will be giving orders to your gangsters, robbing people and collecting debts, stealing valuables and intimidating cops. However, you will also have to manage your restaurant - hire staff, advertise and try to avoid random events that will interfere with your operations. Will you be able to maintain balance between your businesses? How long will you last?
summary: Don Duality is a tycoon game with card mechanics. Send your gangsters to beat out debts, rob banks, steal valuables and launder the money they earn in your establishment. Hire staff for your restaurant and upgrade it
